summary: Completed frontend testing of IB Commerce navigation structure. All navigation dropdowns verified - NO duplicates found. Revenue shows 6 items (Leads, Evaluate, Commit, Contract, Bill, Collect). Procurement shows 6 items (Requests, Evaluate, Commit, Contract, Pay, Spend). Parties Engine is first in Parties dropdown. Governance Engine is first in Governance dropdown. Intelligence Dashboard loads with 4 KPI cards and 4 module cards (Analytics, Reports, Insights, Forecasts). All tested pages load correctly.

issues: Total Revenue shows '₹NaNM' - likely a data formatting issue with null/undefined value

revenue_leads.title: Revenue Leads
features: Stats cards (Total Leads, New, Contacted, Qualified, Disqualified)
Table with Lead ID, Company, Country, Deal Value, Source, Stage, Age, Health, Actions

procurement_requests.title: Procurement Requests
features: Stats cards (Total Requests, Draft, Submitted, Cancelled)
Table with Request ID, Title, Type, Department, Est. Cost, Priority, Status, Needed By
Stats cards (Total, Draft, Minimum Ready, Verified, Restricted, Blocked)
Readiness indicators (Can Evaluate, Can Commit, Can Contract)
Table with Party ID, Legal Name, Country, Roles, Status, Readiness, Source

critical_code_review_comments: Navigation structure is clean with no duplicates in Revenue and Procurement dropdowns
Parties Engine and Governance Engine are correctly positioned as first items in their respective dropdowns
Intelligence is properly configured as a separate solution with 4 modules (Analytics, Reports, Insights, Forecasts)
Minor issue: Commerce Dashboard shows '₹NaNM' for Total Revenue - likely null/undefined data
context_for_next_testing_agent: Navigation structure has been verified - no duplicates in Revenue or Procurement dropdowns. Parties Engine and Governance Engine are first items in their dropdowns. Intelligence Dashboard has 4 KPI cards and 4 module cards. All pages load correctly with proper data-testid attributes.
